Remove Attractor

remove_attractor.Rd

Remove attractor behaviors from sighting table.

Usage

remove_attractor(sighting_table)

Arguments

sighting_table

dataframe. Sightings table cleaned and checked.

Value

Sightings table without attractor and some stats

Examples

remove_attractor(pelascope::Sigthings_with_SegID)
#> → 740 attraction behaviour have been removed from the sighting table.
#> $sightings_table
#> # A tibble: 2,515 × 24
